DOC.brief_summary: The homeopathic remedy consist Arnica Bellis perennis show previous pilot study ( n=33 ) reduce blood loss third stage delivery , compare placebo treatment . The purpose study repeat previous methodology , time large population . 210 parturients randomize one three group : Arnica montana C6 Bellis perennis C6 ( n=70 ) , Arnica montana C30 Bellis perennis C30 ( n=70 ) , double placebo ( n=70 ) .
DOC.criteria: healthy woman 3rd stage labor age 2035 second fifth gestation spontaneous PV delivery term delivery ( 3742nd week ) scar uterus multifetal pregnancy history bleed problem caesarian section delivery chorioamnionitis pregnancyinduced hypertension gestational diabetes mellitus polyhydramnios , premature rupture membrane suspect macrosomy/SGA
DOC.keyword: third stage , labor , postpartum hemorrhage , homeopathy , arnica , bellis perennis
